original_title: Ludwig Hohl - Ein Film in Fragmenten
overview: This is an intimate portrait, made a year before his death, of writer Ludwig Hohl. Born in 1904, Hohl was admired by his peers Max Frisch and Friedrich DÃ¼rrenmatt (and later, Adolf Muschg and Peter Handke), but has long been neglected.
title: Ludwig Hohl - Ein Film in Fragmenten
